{"step_by_step_thinking": "1. PPARG is a gene that encodes for the peroxisome proliferator-activated receptor gamma, which is involved in regulating glucose and lipid metabolism. 2. Type 1 diabetes is an autoimmune disease characterized by the destruction of insulin-producing beta cells in the pancreas. 3. Rare variants in PPARG have been associated with other metabolic disorders, such as type 2 diabetes and insulin resistance. 4.
